patient_info: Abnormality of refraction,Visual loss,Cafe-au-lait spot,Cranial hyperostosis,Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins,Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia,Abnormal shape of the occiput
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. Congenital anomalies of the eye and brain, such as a condition called a "cafe-au-lait spots" and "fibrotic dysplasia"
2. Brain tumors such as a glioma or meningioma
3. Genetic disorders such as neurofibromatosis type 1 (NF1) or type 2 (NF2)
4. Developmental disorders such as a condition called "aniridia"
5. Metabolic disorders such as a rare form of折光不正 called "keratosis maculosa"
6. Endocrine disorders such as a condition called congenital hyperthyroidism
7. Inflammatory diseases such as multiple sclerosis or rheumatoid arthritis
8. Neurdegenerative disorders such as Alzheimer's disease or Parkinson's disease
9. Developmental delays and cognitive impairments
10. Eye diseases such as cataracts or glaucoma.
